stack.summary: [spinal-cord] fix(hooks): Enforce full file paths in all Claude Code operations

fields.why:
Claude Code file operations sometimes use relative paths instead of absolute paths. This causes:

- Ambiguity about which file is being referenced
- Potential for operating on wrong files when cwd changes
- Inconsistent path formats in logs and error messages
- Difficulty tracing file operations in audit logs
fields.how: **All file paths in Claude Code operations MUST be absolute (full) paths.**; This applies to:
fields.lest: Prevent: Ambiguity about which file is being referenced; Prevent: Potential for operating on wrong files when cwd changes; Prevent: Inconsistent path formats in logs and error messages
fields.measuredBy: Hook implemented for all file operation tools; Cross-platform support (Unix and Windows paths); Helpful error message with suggested absolute path; CLAUDE.md updated with full path requirement
